title: oce lag
body: i currently live in Christchurch and have been experiencing horrible lag 120 at loading screen then bouncing between 300-1000 is there anyway to improve this like getting a vpn are there and would you reccomend any vpns btw my internet speeds are around 12mbps download and 0.7mbpsupload

replies.body:
If you go to speedtest.net and run the test to Sydney what kind of ping do you get? Have you tried pinging the OCE server IP via command prompt? 

I would suggest calling your ISP before buying anything though
my ping is around 60 ms to sydney and the upload and download are the same i tried pinging server and it just says request timed out
I would try calling your ISP make sure you don't have any line issues. Because you should be able to ping their server IP
